title: The Deal
description: Every city hides a few sins.  In Manhattan, what I did to Jesse Somerset was mine.  Five years ago, I spent the night with my brother's best friend.  Only he doesn't know it.  Now he's back in my life. In need of a phony wife.  And I know I'm going to sin again...   AUTHOR'S NOTE: This is a full-length, stand alone, brother's best friend/forbidden romance with humor, suspense and heat. Happy Reading!
author: Natalie Wrye
